name: 1-DAY ADVENTURE 7KM PARADISE CAVE TOUR
description: The 7-kilometer trek into the depths of the Thien Duong, better known as the Paradise Cave was one of the coolest adventures we’ve had. Active explorer Paradise 7,000m depth, suitable for enthusiasts who conquer nature, love to explore, sports, adventure and above all the feeling to find yourself again.On this tour you will walk 3.5km into this breathtaking cave, past the lights and tourists, over rocks and through underground rivers to admire the beauty manifold, full of novelties of system dynamic stalactite Thien Duong cave.
